ai-tika-s0403t18:2_1: Fourth: “I will be the first to live having few wishes, contentment, seclusion, aloofness, arousing energy, ethics, immersion, and wisdom. I will have few wishes.” “I will live in the wilderness, having few wishes, contentment, having few wishes, contentment, effacement, seclusion, oppresssiveness of wishes, contentment, secluded, aloofness, and energetic.”
ai-tika-s0403t18:3_0: who destroys a cow is damaged at the gate, and doesn’t give away things.
ai-tika-s0403t18:3_1: Likewise with milk, etc., similar to milk, to others.
ai-tika-s0403t18:3_2: In the same way, just as these five wilderness jackals are disgusting and repulsive in these five kinds of worms, so too this is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the five.
ai-tika-s0403t18:3_3: These kinds of wilderness dwellers should not be understood as wilderness-dwellers.
ai-tika-s0403t18:3_4: For the rest and the wore rags.
ai-tika-s0403t18:4_0: The Wilderness Discourses on the forest is finished.
